response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. This exceptional item, valued at $10,000 to you, is now being offered to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of serving you with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 9500}
